verses.roman:
"nadīyā calaha, mātāre kahiha namaskāra
āmāra nāme pāda-padma dhariha tāṅhāra

synonyms: nadīyā calaha—start for Nadia; mātāre—unto My mother; kahiha—tell; namaskāra—My obeisances; āmāra nāme—in My name; pāda-padma—the lotus feet; dhariha—catch; tāṅhāra—her.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu told Jagadānanda Paṇḍita,"Go to Nadia and offer My obeisances to My mother. Touch her lotus feet in My name.
